overview:
Kelley Sloane is the Chief Marketing Officer and co-Founder of Rewardix, LLC. Rewardix brings to market a new social commerce model that takes advantage of the local relationships between merchants and consumers and changes how consumers save money and how merchants acquire, retain and reward customers for their loyalty.

Kelley is an accomplished marketing executive producing results for Fortune 500 companies including GE, HP and other multi-national companies. Kelley created and led the worldwide marketing organization for Exstream Software. She has been a featured speaker at industry events around the world, and has won numerous awards during her career, including “Woman of Distinction” in 2008 by a leading media organization. She holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Kentucky.
